name: ShadowLight (kiririn39m, emulator0, disablak)
description:
This game was made for Godot Wild Game Jam #46

Created by:

  • Dan Tselish
  • Max Verchinsky
  • Vladislav Boroday

Special thanks:

  • Max Krepchuk

Game idea:

  • Navigate trough levels to get to the finish
  • Avoid "shadow" enemy
  • Collect keys to open finish and move to next level
  • Optionally, you can collect secret collectables. Every level features exactly one. If you manage to collect all of them, you will get an alternative ending scene.

Resources used:

  • Godot game engine by Juan Linietsky, Ariel Manzur and contributors
  • Ghost Voices - SFX by Patrick Flattery
  • Trueno Font by KineticPlasma Fonts

Controls: 

  • Use WASD or Arrow keys to navigate through the game levels
  • Use Mouse to point and click on buttons in game menu
